mapper.select: select t.* from ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum, pj_freeboard.* FROM pj_freeboard, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r where ${param3} like '%${param4}%' ORDER BY refer DESC, step ASC ) t where t.rownum between #{param1} and #{param2}
select count(*) from pj_freeboard where ${param1} like '%${param2}%'
select free_no, title, content, userid, credential_id, filename, regdate, refer, depth, step from pj_freeboard where free_no=#{free_no}
select re_no, free_no, credential_id, userid, content, regdate from pj_re_freeboard where free_no=#{free_no} order by re_no asc
mapper.update: update pj_freeboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename} where free_no=#{free_no}
mapper.insert: insert into pj_freeboard(free_no, credential_id, userid, refer, depth, step, hit, title, regdate, filename, content ) values((select max(PJ_FREEBOARD_NO)+1 from pj_free_board a), #{credential_id}, #{userid}, #{refer}, #{depth}, #{step}, #{hit}, #{title}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{filename},#{content})

insert into pj_re_freeboard ( re_no, free_no, credential_id, userid, content, regdate ) values ( (select max(re_no) from pj_re_freeboard a)+1, #{free_no}, #{credential_id}, #{userid}, #{content}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.update: update pj_freeboard SET hit=hit+1 where free_no=#{free_no}
update pj_freeboard set step=step+1, depth=depth+1 where refer=#{param1} and step>#{param2}
